ui.name: Splash screen variant 1: Serene, flowing evolutionary ecosystem with blues and greens, peaceful creatures, symbiotic relationships, organic growth patterns

source.prompt:
Create a splash for an evolutionary ecosystem game called "Ebb & Bloom".

Description: Splash screen variant 1: Serene, flowing evolutionary ecosystem with blues and greens, peaceful creatures, symbiotic relationships, organic growth patterns

Style: Organic, flowing, nature-inspired design with smooth curves and natural patterns

Brand colors: Deep indigo (#4A5568), emerald green (#38A169), trait gold (#D69E2E), echo silver (#A0AEC0)

Requirements: Full-screen splash screen for mobile game, portrait orientation (1080x1920), atmospheric and immersive, suitable for loading screen, brand identity visible


IMPORTANT: Full-screen image, optimized for mobile display, portrait orientation
